name: C2H6O
description:
One of the greatest scientists, Dolcius, as always, was sitting in his laboratory and calculating something, looking for a limit of the sequence

It seemed to him that he was on the threshold of some important discovery, here it is, somewhere around here.. The particle of the anobtanium reacts with the condenser, transfers the deuce, and changes its disability to the radioactive spider..

Before eyes, everything began to swim .. and he realized that divide by zero is the norm!

at the same time, an outbreak occurred, and he woke up in some world idiocracy .. everywhere: zombies, trolls, insects and terrorists.

OPERATE! HELP HIM TO AVOID FROM HERE, WHILE THIS EXPIRED THIS
HALF-LIVE

💎 Open world space with a practical design
💎 Over different enemies ranging from zombies, trolls, insects and terrorists
💎 Random Narrative, game events and random enemies for a real FPS challenge
💎 Old Style FPS shooter with fluid gameplay
💎 A new type of AI which offers challenging and unpredictable gameplay
💎 Multiple endings and a story which evolves based on random events and the choices you make in each game
💎 Various Fast-paced and challenging waves of enemies
💎 Tons More different weapons
💎 Real Physics
